text: "Under Your Spell Again" is a 1959 song by country singer Buck Owens. It was taken from his debut studio album Buck Owens. It went to number 4 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. It has been covered by Waylon Jennings with Jessi Colter and by Ray Price. title: Under Your Spell Again
